title: The Magic school bus explores the human body (PC)
brief_description: Join Ms. Frizzle and the class on a wacky trip into Arnold’s body. Along the way you will explore how the human body works as you discover a way out of Arnold and win the game. STYSTEMS REQUIREMENTS: A multimedia PC or compatible with a 486SX or higher microprocessor, 25MHz, 4MB of RAM, at least 5MB of available hard-disk space, double speed CDROM drive, 8-bit audio board, and SVGA display capable of 256 colours. MS-DOS operating system version 5.0 or later. Microsoft Windows operating system version 3.1 or later.
